scripts.dev: pnpm init:config && node ./pre-dev.mjs && pnpm migrate && wrangler dev --port 8087
scripts.deploy: pnpm init:config && pnpm pre-deploy && pnpm migrate:remote && wrangler deploy
scripts.deploy:dry-run: pnpm init:config && pnpm pre-deploy && pnpm migrate:remote && wrangler deploy --dry-run
scripts.deploy:reset: pnpm deploy && wrangler d1 execute one-balance --remote --command "UPDATE keys SET status = 'active', model_coolings = '{}', total_cooling_seconds = 0;"
